meanings.definition: A written or filmed account of a journey or series of journeys.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed reading the travelogues of famous explorers.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a detailed travelogue about her trip to Europe.
meanings.sent3: The library had a collection of travelogues that made me want to pack my bags and go on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her travelogue was like a window into different cultures and landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The vivid descriptions in the travelogue transported me to far-off places.

meanings.definition: A genre of literature that describes travel experiences.
meanings.sent1: Travelogues are popular among those who love reading about different countries.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the travelogue section in the bookstore.
meanings.sent3: The travelogue genre always makes me dream of faraway lands.
meanings.sent4: Her writing style in the travelogue genre is captivating.
meanings.sent5: The travelogue genre allows readers to explore the world through words.

meanings.definition: A documentary film or television program that showcases travel destinations.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we watched a fascinating travelogue about Japan.
meanings.sent2: The travelogue on TV inspired me to plan my next vacation.
meanings.sent3: The travelogue documentary was so engaging that I felt like I was on the trip.
meanings.sent4: The cinematography in the travelogue was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: Watching the travelogue made me eager to visit new places.
